titles: A proclamation set furth by the Kinges Maiesty, with the aduise of his highnes most honorable privy counsail, concerning casters and senders abrode of slaunderous and sedicious billes, the xx. day of May the v. yere of his most prosperous reigne
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
